verses.text: And it came to pass a long time after that the \sc Lord\sc* had given rest unto Israel from all their enemies round about, that Joshua waxed old \add and\add* stricken in age.
And Joshua called for all Israel, \add and\add* for their elders, and for their heads, and for their judges, and for their officers, and said unto them, I am old \add and\add* stricken in age:
and ye have seen all that the \sc Lord\sc* your God hath done unto all these nations because of you; for the \sc Lord\sc* your God \add is\add* he that hath fought for you.

Behold, I have divided unto you \add by lot\add* these nations that remain, to be an inheritance for your tribes, from Jordan, with all the nations that I have cut off, even \add unto\add* the great sea westward.
And the \sc Lord\sc* your God, he shall expel them from before you, and drive them from out of your sight; and ye shall possess their land, as the \sc Lord\sc* your God hath promised unto you.
Be ye therefore very courageous to keep and to do all that is written in the book of the law of Moses, that \add ye\add* turn not aside therefrom \add to\add* the right hand or \add to\add* the left;

that \add ye\add* come not among these nations, these that remain amongst you; neither make mention of the name of their gods, nor cause to swear \add by them\add*, neither serve them, nor bow yourselves unto them.
But cleave unto the \sc Lord\sc* your God, as ye have done unto this day.
For the \sc Lord\sc* hath driven out from before you great nations and strong: but \add as for\add* you, no man hath \add been able to\add* stand before you unto this day.
One man of you shall chase a thousand: for the \sc Lord\sc* your God, he \add it is\add* that fighteth for you, as he hath promised you.
Take good heed therefore unto yourselves, that ye love the \sc Lord\sc* your God.
Else if ye do in any wise go back, and cleave unto the remnant of these nations, \add even\add* these that remain among you, and shall make marriages with them, and go in unto them, and they to you:

know for a certainty that the \sc Lord\sc* your God will no more drive out \add any of\add* these nations from before you; but they shall be snares and traps unto you, and scourges in your sides, and thorns in your eyes, until ye perish from off this good land which the \sc Lord\sc* your God hath given you.

And behold, \add this\add* day I am going the way of all the earth: and ye know in all your hearts and in all your souls, that not one thing hath failed of all the good things which the \sc Lord\sc* your God spake concerning you; all are come to pass unto you, \add and\add* not one thing hath failed thereof.

Therefore it shall come to pass, \add that\add* as all good things are come upon you, which the \sc Lord\sc* your God promised you; so shall the \sc Lord\sc* bring upon you all evil things, until he have destroyed you from off this good land which the \sc Lord\sc* your God hath given you.

When ye have transgressed the covenant of the \sc Lord\sc* your God, which he commanded you, and have gone and served other gods, and bowed yourselves to them; then shall the anger of the \sc Lord\sc* be kindled against you, and ye shall perish quickly from off the good land which he hath given unto you.
